author: Pete Lamborne
comment: It looks nice - the location is often a good bit off (could be location services, not the widget), but my main complaint is that the options for 9/12/15 hours don't work.  You only get the 6hr forecast.  Also, sometimes, it just says "waiting for location" for hours on end...  EDIT: Updated to 5 stars.  I swapped out watch faces, brought this one back, and now I have the full 15 hours of weather.  On top of that, I appreciate the dev's personal reply.  This is by far the nicest looking watchface with weather in my opinion.

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: Hi, the location is the one with the most recent data available as it gets returned from weather provider. So it may look a bit off, that's true. I'll investigate in forecast options, thanks for letting me know.

author: Joey Numbers
comment: But maybe give us a chance to pick the weather provider? Mine is off by 10+ degrees :/ makes the widget unusable. Please update for fifth star.

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: Hi Joey, I'm working on it. It will not be any time soon, but I'll introduce more weather providers in the future.

title: I really like it but...

author: Brandon Ryan
comment: Not only does it not work, but it made my NOTE 5 sluggish and drained my battery. Can't believe I spent money on this. Removed and all back to normal.
title: Awful

author: Robert Rouland
comment: I really want a 3 day forecast with high/low and symbol. 6, 12, 15 hours really does nothing for me. 3 days would be awesome. Thanks.
title: I like but...

author: Mike Coleman
comment: Costs money, does nothing. Can't get more useless than that

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: Hi. Please contact me on my email android@dmn.cz. There we can discuss your problem. Have you tried to open the configuration application on your phone and activate the widget?

title: Waste of time & money.

author: Garrett Rodriguez
comment: Took forever to finally work (kind of...) Had to adjust settings, activate/reactivate, reboot watch many times. Then it just stayed at waiting for data. Now keeps force closing. Will only work on specific settings for a while. Really wanted this to work too :/. Fix bugs and add a battery icon and this would definitely be 5 stars.

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: Hi Garrett, sorry to see you have such problems to make the widget work. It's usually piece of cake. However I see a lot of trouble reports, so the stability will soon get much better.

title: Very hard to get working - Moto 360

author: Dave Waddling
comment: The shaded background makes the widget hard to read and then the location name isn't fully viewable on the screen as the font is too large. Not worth the money
title: Not great

author: K Hamilton
comment: Ok i just purchased the weather app for the watch and it doesn't even work!!!!! Is there a way I can get my money refunded if the app continues to say weather not available????
title: LG G Watch

author: Magnus Sandin
comment: Something happend and today it only said weather unavailable when it tries to receive weather data for my location...

author: René van Grieken
comment: Weather unavailable it says! Makes it totally useless!

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: Hi, this message comes from the weather provider. Either you're in an area not covered by it (which I doubt) or the weather information is just temporarily unavailable. How long was your watch giving the unavailable information? Don't hesitate to contact me on my email android@dmn.cz

title: Doesn't work!!

author: Robin Hebert
comment: Whatever I try to do, the weather is not showing up

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: Hi. Please contact me on my email android@dmn.cz. There we can discuss your problem. Have you tried to open the configuration application on your phone and activate the widget?

title: Weather is not showing up and I paid for it

author: Charles H Boykins
comment: Accurate, Amazing, Beautiful, Useful. A Truly Must Have!
title: Gadget Particular Consumer

author: Oneal Freeman
comment: Do good

author: Dan Ursan
comment: Nice

author: Geoff Heldon
comment: It's been on waiting for data for over an hour. What can I do?

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: It's a strange issue. The widget should report every step of updating the weather data: waiting for location, retrieving current weather data, retrieving forecast data. If it's just waiting for data it means it wasn't even able to communicate with phone part of the application. Have you tried to restart face and phone? Let me know at android@dmn.cz

title: Stuck on waiting for data

author: Sivan Koren
comment: The forecast in the US is very inaccurate and can be off up to 20 degrees. If you're in the US you might not have much luck with that kind of forecast. Otherwise the app looks great and works well on Nexus 5 w/ Moto 360. Good luck, developer. I hope you find a good weather API for your business model because I like your app.
title: Really nice BUT,

author: catalin zt
comment: Now doesn't work at all   :(

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: Hi, the update just introduced some status information to the widget start process to see what it's actually doing, because some users experienced broken functionality and not displaying the weather at all. Can you please contact me on android@dmn.cz with some details? What do you see on widget screen? Thank you.

author: Victor Gonzalez
comment: Nice face, an accurate weather, forecasts, really nice work,
title: Bes looking face

author: Pete Craig
comment: When switching faces then switching back the widget gives no watch data,  it also only updates every three hours,  it doesn't display 24 hour times for afternoon or show pm eg 3:00pm is shown as 3:00

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: Pete, there's no third party app needed. All you need to have is Bokeh Watch Face 1.0.0 or higher installed. The previous versions (0.9xx) don't have the menu as it arrived in version 1. So please try to update the Bokeh Watch Face application first. If you still experience problems, let me know at android@dmn.cz.

title: Ok but

author: Jorge Luis Pagan
comment: Why can't I find a watch face with accurate weather ?

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: Hi, sorry to hear this. But it is probably impossible to find weather provider with correct data for whole world. If you're aware of provider with correct data please let me know on android@dmn.cz. I can incorporate it and give an option to change the provider in settings.

title: Temp is WAY off

author: shane b
comment: Doesn't show celsius on the watch. Configuration shows celsius but watch only displays Fahrenheit. Refunded....

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content:
Hi Shane, I'm personally using Celsius and I see no problem. Have you tried to restart watch and phone? Just for sure...
Let me know on android@dmn.cz in case you're still interested in the widget.

title: No celsius

author: keep thinking
comment: Paid or did not show weather and had Google play services problem

reply.author: Tomáš Kletzander
reply.content: Hi, have you managed to solve your problem? If not, please let me know on android@dmn.cz so we can discuss further steps.

title: Bokeh
